description:
Below are spaces for when you would like to display
things above skills when you open the menu.
name: -----Reservado

description: Performs a series of attacks on an enemy.
name: Ataque Dual

description: Performs a double attack on a random enemy.
name: Ataque Doble

description: Performs a triple attack on a random enemy.
name: Ataque Triple

description: The user flees from battle.
name: Escapar

description: Whip attack contra todos los enemigos.
name: Látigo de Antena

description: Inflige daño on an enemy.
name: Gran Pinza

description: Absorbs MP from an enemy.
name: Danza Extraña

message1: %1 licks with dozens of slimy tongues!
name: Tormenta de Lengüetazos

description: Blinds todos los enemigos.
name: Destello

message1: %1 Flings globs of moss all around!
name: Flujo de Musgo

description: Inflige daño on an enemy.
name: Arañazo

description: Confuses todos los enemigos.
name: Mirada Profunda

description: Confuses todos los enemigos.
name: Mirada de Muchos Ojos

description: Confuses todos los enemigos.
name: Mirada Infinita

description:
Painfully grow new teeth. Painful, but increases
daño for 3 turns.
name: Dentición

description:
Protective teeth grow all over your body.
Painful, but decreases daño taken for 4 turns.
name: Armadura de Dientes

description: Inflige daño on an enemy.
name: Garra

description:
Become the grinning beast. User may become
confused and attack your friends.
name: Bestia Sonriente

description:
Flash countless unsettling grins.
May confuse enemies.
name: Sonrisas Inquietantes

description: Bite attack; devastating on aturdirned targets.
name: Devorar

description:
Emit a deafening scream. Causes daño and may aturdir
everyone, friend and foe alike.
name: Grito

description:
Crush everything under your feet - attacks 3 random
enemies for high daño.
name: Alboroto

description: Crush anything under your wheels.
name: Conducción Temeraria

description:
A stalked target is more vulnerable to attacks
and critical hits.
name: Acechar

description:
Very high daño on stalked target.
Requires a slashing or piercing weapon to use.
name: Apuñalar

description:
Reveal your face. Stalks and confuses everyone.
Your defense falls, but melee attacks are more deadly.
name: Desenmascarar

description:
Hide your face again. Lose effects of Unmask.
Gain temporary boost to defenses.
name: Ocultar Rostro

description:
Take target's soul. Can only be done once
per target. Drains life and weakens target.
name: Drenaje de Alma

description:
Ataques 4 targets. High daño on stalked targets.
Sates Hellen's bloodlust for a day.
name: Masacre

description:
Go into a frenzy and drain everyone's souls.
Drains life and weakens targets.
name: Festín de Almas

description:
Kick with many legs! Hits four times on random
enemies, and may aturdir them.
name: Multipatada

message1: %1 licks its many sets of lips...
name: Lamer Labios

description:
(Perforante) Causa little daño, but is nearly certain
to cause aturdir. Alta probabilidad to dañar el arma.
message1: %1 flicks with an enormous index finger!
name: Golpe Rápido

description:
Cura wounds in combat. More effective if target 
is heavily wounded, ineffective on light wounds.
name: Detener Hemorragia

message1: %1 stomps around on its giant finger-legs
name: Danza de Dedos

description:
(Aplastamiento) Poderoso attack with a probabilidad de aturdir.
High likelihood to dañar el arma.
name: Puñetazo Poderoso

message1: %1 fires pistol shots in a panic!
name: Disparos Frenéticos

description: Vomit a terrible acidic fluid.
name: Babeo Ácido

description:
Become the grinning beast. Do not hold back. May
become confused and attack your friends.
name: Bestia Desatada

description:
Infectious touch. Afflicts target with disease,
severely weakening them.
name: Agarre Repugnante

description: Ataques multiple targets in a mad rage!
name: Tajos Furiosos

description: Vomit a terrible acidic fluid.
name: Vomitar

description: Vomit a terrible acidic fluid.
name: Aliento de Fuego

description: Vomit a terrible acidic fluid.
name: Incinerar

description:
Quick crushing attack based on agility.
Ignores half of defense, small probabilidad de aturdir.
name: Patada

description:
Crushing attack based on your remaining HP.
Ignores half of defense.
name: Abrazo de Oso

description:
Rest to regain 30% HP and STM for 3 turns. Gain
Rested status. Consumes Papineau's Lunch for the day.
name: En Descanso

description:
Share your lunch with the team. Cura whole party
for 30% HP and STM. Consumes Papineau's Lunch.
name: Compartir Almuerzo

description: Vomit a terrible acidic fluid.
message1: %1 emits a blinding jet of steam!
name: Silbido de Vapor

description: Vomit a terrible acidic fluid.
message1: %1 emits a blinding jet of steam!
name: Jet de Vapor

description:
Flings toxic goop all over, inflicting both poison
and acid burns.
message1: %1 dances around, flinging toxic goop all over!
name: Danza Tóxica

message2: and manages to stay in control!
name: Autocontrol

description: Spits a glob of corrosive paint!
name: Escupir Pintura

description: Vomit a terrible acidic fluid.
name: Escupir Aguas Residuales

description:
Painfully grow new teeth. Aumenta defense and bite
daño for 3 turns, or until teeth are lost.
name: Dentición

description:
Painfully shoot teeth out of your mouth like
a cannon. More powerful after teething. Loses teeth.
message1: %1 fires a torrent of teeth from his mouth!
name: Cañón de Dientes

description:
Joel grows biting jaws all over his body. Draws enemy
attacks and counterattacks with bite for 4 turns.
message1: %1 painfully grows biting jaws all over!
name: Armadura Mordiente

description:
Shoots protective teeth at todos los enemigos. Requires
Biting Armor. Elimina Teething and Teeth Armor.
name: Estallido de Dientes

description:
Joel's teeth spin like a roundsaw. Causes grievous
bleeding.
name: Mandíbula de Sierra Circular

description:
Regrow dañod gum, regenerating HP for several
turns.
name: Atascar la Obra

description:
Teeth shoot out of Joel's skin in a storm!
Causa half of Joel's remaining HP as daño to all.
name: Tormenta de Dientes

description:
Attempt to craft a Monty Special - needed for
special attacks.
name: Brebaje de Batalla

description:
Belch fire using a Monty Special! 80 Fire dmg,
and causes burns. Makes Monty catatonic.
message1: %1 takes a swig of his Monty Special
name: Eructo de Fuego

description:
Boosts Melee and Balística, but also poisons.
Calms down Xaria when she's Berserk.
message1: %1 goads them into drinking a Monty Special...
name: ¡Salud!

description:
Had one too many... Spits 3x 40 Acid dmg attacks,
and causes acid burn. Makes Monty catatonic.
message1: %1 takes a swig of his Monty Special
name: Escupitajo Ácido

description:
Breathe flames using a Monty Special! 80 Fire dmg,
and burns to todos los enemigos. Makes Monty catatonic.
message1: %1 takes a swig of his Monty Special
name: Aliento de Fuego

description:
Eeeeeeverything burns! Hahahahahahahaha!
Set everything on fire. Makes Monty catatonic.
message1: %1 sets fire to the whole battlefield!
name: Piromanía

description:
Slap them awake! Cura Sleep and Catatonic. May also
cure Panic, Confusion, Charm, Stun and Rage.
name: ¡Reacciona!

description:
Yell at it!!! Xaria is VERY good at yelling.
May cause Panic and Confusion.
name: Reprender

description: A punch straight to the gut for camaraderie.
message2: OOF! No, no, I'm okay, it just took me off-guard!
name: Amor Duro

description:
The words hit worse than the bullets.
15 Crushing dmg to 3 random targets. May cause Rage.
name: Burla

description:
YEAAAAAARGH! Everyone acts twice per turn for two
turns. Makes Xaria freak out for a while...
message1: %1 starts a mosh pit! In the middle of battle!
name: Mosh Pit

description:
Go a little bit nuts. Lose control and attack
enemies! Ataques may cause panic.
name: Perder el Control

description:
Morton is very quick with his hands! He can use
bandages in combat. Recovers 20% HP and heals bleed.
name: Vendaje Rápido

description:
Morton is very quick with his hands! He can use
first aid kits in combat. Recover 50% HP and revive.
name: Primeros Auxilios Rápidos

description:
Look for a piece of junk to fidget with...
You might find something good.
message1: %1 looks for something to fidget with...
name: Fidgetear

description:
Discard your current fidget junk, and look for
something else...
message1: %1 looks for something to fidget with...
name: Fidgetear

description: Toss the garbage you've been fidgeting with!
name: Lanzar Basura

description:
When hidden, enrages one target, making them more
vulnerable to tricks. Exposes you to attacks.
name: Truco - Provocar

description: Hide in the shadows.
name: ¡Esconderse!

description: Attempt to steal an item.
name: Robar

description:
When hidden, enrages one target, making them more
vulnerable to tricks. Exposes you to attacks.
name: Truco - Provocar

description:
When hidden, daños and confuses one target.
Exposes you to attacks.
name: Truco - Confusión

description:
When hidden, daños and aturdirs one target.
Exposes you to attacks.
name: Truco - Aturdir

description:
When hidden, daños and blinds one target.
Exposes you to attacks.
name: Truco - Ceguera

description:
When hidden, daños and poisons one target.
Exposes you to attacks.
name: Truco - Veneno

description:
When hidden, cause confusion, Blind, Stun and Poison
on todos los enemigos. Exposes you to attacks.
name: Truco - Caos

description:
Allows you to pull tricks without exposing
yourself to attacks.
name: Distracción

description:
Come out of hiding for a nasty ambush!
Causa very high daño with the equipped melee weapon.
name: Emboscada

description:
Very effective and at little STM cost,
but with very high probabilidad de dañar el arma.
name: Ataque Temerario

description:
Ataque that pierces half of target defenses.
Increased probabilidad de dañar el arma.
name: Ensartar

description:
Four quick strikes to random targets.
Increased probabilidad de dañar el arma.
name: Estocadas Rápidas

description:
Mighty thrust that pierces all defenses.
Increased probabilidad de dañar el arma.
name: Penetrar

description:
Poderoso strike to vitals. May instantly kill target.
Greatly increased probabilidad de dañar el arma.
name: Empalar

description:
If doubling daño would kill target, double daño.
Increased probabilidad de dañar el arma.
name: Golpe de Gracia

description:
Rake deep gouges into the enemy! Causes bleeding!
Increased probabilidad de dañar el arma.
name: Rastrillar

description: A heavy stabbing attack.
name: Bayoneta

description:
Ataque with a high probabilidad de cause bleeding.
Slightly increased risk of damaging your weapon.
name: Corte Profundo

description:
High-daño attack. May cause bleeding.
Slightly increased risk of damaging your weapon.
name: Tallar

description:
Swing at 3 random targets. May cause bleeding.
Increased risk of damaging your weapon.
name: Tajar y Cortar

description:
Mighty swing at all targets. May cause bleeding.
Increased risk of damaging your weapon.
name: Hender

description:
Slash at a target as you unsheathe the sword.
Mighty slashing attack with a probabilidad de bleed.
name: Ataque Desenvainar

description: Put the katana back in its protective sheath.
message1: %1 sheathes the katana in one smooth motion.
name: Envainar Espada

description:
If target is aturdirned, deals triple daño.
Greatly increased probabilidad de dañar el arma.
name: Decapitación

description:
High-daño attack with a probabilidad de aturdir.
Slightly increased risk of damaging your weapon.
name: Golpe Poderoso

description:
Mighty baseball swing.
Very high risk of damaging your weapon.
name: Jonrón

description:
Poderoso, accurate golf swing. Empowered by luck.
High risk of damaging your weapon.
name: Golpe de Albatros

description:
"Non-lethal" strike.
Alta probabilidad to aturdir al objetivo.
name: Golpe de Supresión

description:
Harsh cleaning products clean the grime away.
Slightly increased risk of damaging your weapon.
name: Golpe Purificador

description:
A powerful, wound-up shot. Fuerte but innacurate.
Slightly increased risk of damaging your weapon.
name: Disparo de Tiro

description: Ataque with the butt of your gun.
message1: %1 ataca with the butt of the weapon!
name: Culatazo

description:
Slice with the chainsaw. Alta probabilidad of inflicting
Bleed.
name: Sierra

description:
A powerful, wound-up shot. Fuerte but innacurate.
Slightly increased risk of damaging your weapon.
name: Disparo de Tiro

description:
A tackle to knock an enemy off-balance.
Gains a bonus from your defense.
name: Golpe Corporal

description: Fire a special paintball shot prepared by Monty...
name: Tiro Foul

description: Fire 12 rounds.
name: Ráfaga Completa

description: Fire two rifle rounds quickly.
name: Multidisparo de Rifle

description: Fire a crossbow bolt at one target.
name: Virote de Ballesta

description: Fire a flaming crossbow bolt at one target.
name: Virote Llameante

description: Fire an acid crossbow bolt at one target.
name: Rayo Ácido

description:
Fire an explosive crossbow bolt at one target.
May aturdir the target.
name: Virote Explosivo

description: Shoot a weird crossbow bolt at one target.
name: Virote Extraño

description: Fire a single pistol round.
name: Disparo de Pistola

description: Fire multiple pistol rounds.
name: Multidisparo de Pistola

description: Fire a single rifle round.
name: Disparo de Rifle

description:
Carefully aim before a shot, hitting an enemy's
weak point.
name: Disparo Apuntado

description: Fire a single armor-piercing magnum round.
name: Disparo de Magnum

description: Fire three armor-piercing magnum rounds.
name: Multidisparo de Magnum

description: Fire a single shotgun blast.
name: Disparo de Escopeta

description: Fire three shotgun blasts at a group of enemies.
name: Multiexplosión

description:
Fire a wide-spray shotgun blast at a group
of enemies.
message1: %1 fires a shotgun blast in a wide arc!
name: Explosión Amplia

description:
Fire both barrels of the shotgun in a wide-spray
blast at a group of enemies.
name: Explosión Doble

description: Fire a single SMG round.
name: Disparo de Subfusil

description: Fire a burst of 4 SMG rounds.
message1: %1 fires a burst of SMG rounds!
name: Ráfaga de Subfusil

description: Fully automatic fire at random enemies.
message1: %1 says a prayer and fires randomly at the
name: Rociar y Rezar

description: Fire a single high caliber round.
name: Disparo de Alto Calibre

description: Fire four high caliber rounds in quick succession.
name: Ráfaga de Alto Calibre

description:
Aim at a single target and spray a dense jet of
liquid fire.
name: Ráfaga de Fuego Estrecha

description: Blast an arc of liquid fire at todos los enemigos.
message1: %1 sprays liquid fire in a wide arc!
name: Ráfaga de Fuego Amplia

description: Aim at a single target and spray acid.
message1: %1 sprays a narrow jet of acid!
name: Rociado Estrecho

description: Blast an arc of acid at todos los enemigos.
message1: %1 sprays acid in a wide arc!
name: Rociado Amplio

description: Fire both barrels of the shotgun at a un solo enemigo.
name: Disparo Doble

description: Reloads the pistol.
name: Recargar Pistola

description: Reloads the magnum.
name: Recargar Magnum

description: Reloads the SMG.
name: Recargar Subfusil

description: Reloads the shotgun.
name: Recargar Escopeta

description: Reloads the rifle.
name: Recargar Rifle

description: Reloads the rifle.
name: Recargar Rifle

description: Reloads the Gatling gun.
name: Recargar Ametralladora

description: Replace the fuel tank. Uses up a can of Gasoline.
name: Reemplazar Tanque de Combustible

description: Replace the acid tank. Uses up a bottle of herbicide.
name: Reemplazar Tanque de Ácido

description: Replace the X-Acid tank.
name: Reemplazar Tanque de Ácido-X

description: Reload the dart gun with normal darts.
name: Cargar Dardo

description: Reloads the dart gun with tranquilizer darts.
name: Cargar Dardo Tranquilizante

description: Reloads the dart gun with acid darts.
name: Cargar Dardo Ácido

description: Reload the grenade launcher.
name: Cargar Granada

description: Reload the grenade launcher with a gas grenade.
name: Cargar Granada de Gas

description: Reload the grenade launcher with an acid grenade.
name: Cargar Granada Ácida

description: Reload the grenade launcher with a fire grenade.
name: Cargar Granada de Fuego

description: Reload the crossbow with a normal bolt.
name: Cargar Virote

description: Reloads the crossbow with a flame bolt.
name: Cargar Virote Llameante

description: Reloads the crossbow with an acid bolt.
name: Cargar Virote Ácido

description: Reload the crossbow with an explosive bolt.
name: Cargar Virote Explosivo

description: Reload the crossbow with a strange bolt.
name: Cargar Virote Extraño

description: Reloads the paintball gun.
name: Recargar Bolas de Pintura

message1: %1 fires a volley of gatling gun bullets!
name: Fuego Automático de Ametralladora

description: Fire four quick rifle rounds at a un solo enemigo.
name: Multidisparo de Rifle

description: Fire a marble.
name: Tirachinas

description: Pour gasoline into the chainsaw's fuel tank.
name: Repostar Motosierra

description: Swap a new battery in your melee weapon.
message1: %1 puts a new battery in the device!
name: Reemplazar Batería

description:
Fire a shotgun blast at point blank range.
Very powerful, but has short reach.
message1: %1 fires a shotgun blast at point blank range!
name: Disparo a Quemarropa

description:
Fire a double shotgun blast at point blank range.
Very powerful, but has short reach.
message1: %1 fires a double shotgun blast at point blank range!
name: Doble Disparo a Quemarropa

message1: %1 swings the heavy weapon like a club!
name: Balanceo de Arma Pesada

message1: %1 fires a rocket at point blank!
name: Explosión a Quemarropa

description:
The whole world must partake my dolor - the
anguish of a curse that knoweth no end.
name: Dolor

description:
Thou canst not escape the malice of the abyss.
Embrace it, and be made whole in darkness.
name: Agujero Negro

message1: %1 emits multiple beams of terrible radiation!
name: Cuásar

description:
Take upon thee the burden of my grief - the
foreordained path of my cursed fate.
name: Maldecir

description: Out of malice shall all creation perish.
name: Maldición

message1: You are tempted to embrace death.
name: Llamar

description:
I shall take thee into mine own being, and from thy
torment shall my power blossom.
name: Absorber

description:
All shall wither in my shadow. Come forth! Thou
shalt be my sustenance!
name: Absorción Masiva

description:
Lo, from the cosmic interstice do shadowed blades
slay the weak.
name: Cuchillos Oscuros

message1: %1's whispers in your ear are enticing...
name: Corromper

message1: %1's speaks words you wish were not true.
name: Revelación

description:
All men must yield unto death. Accept thy portion
with poise and grace.
message1: All must embrace death in the end.
name: Oblivion

description:
Begin the video on a calm, positive note.
Enables support and healing skills. \I[154]\C[6]+\V[812]
message1: %1 plays it cool to his stream viewers.
name: Introducción Calmada

description:
Cura life of one target.
\I[154]\C[10]-1
name: Healing

description:
Cura poison on one target.
\I[154]\C[10]-1
message1: %1 sucks out the poison on stream! Gross.
name: Curar

description:
Boosts the defense of whole party.
\I[154]\C[10]-2
message1: %1 gives a motivating speech! It actually sucks.
name: Bendecir

description:
Protect a party member from daño.
\I[154]\C[10]-1
name: Protection

description: Ask stream chat for information.
message1: %1 asks his viewers about this guy...
name: Poll Viewers

description:
Cura most mental status ailements.
\I[154]\C[10]-3
name: Palabras Calmantes

description:
Cura life of todos los aliados.
\I[154]\C[10]-4
message1: %1 helps to reinvigorate the whole team.
name: Mass Heal

description:
Change the video's tone to an angry one. Switch to
offensive skills.
name: Get Angry

description:
Begin the video on an angry, negative note.
Enables offensive skills. \I[154]\C[6]+\V[813]
message1: %1 causa a SCENE on stream as he kicks it off!
name: Irate Intro

description:
Piercing words for one target.
Greatly boosted by viewership. \I[154]\C[6]+2
name: Vicious Remarks

description:
Slashing daño to 3 random targets. May cause bleed.
Makes yourself blind.\I[154]\C[6]+3
name: Furia Ciega

description:
Crushing daño, and may aturdir. Embarassing tantrum,
but entertaining. Makes yourself panic. \I[154]\C[6]+6
message1: %1 FREAKS OUT and causa an embarrassing scene!
name: Perder el Control

description:
Lose it completely. Blast daño to all targets.
Makes yourself enraged.\I[154]\C[10]-5
message1: %1 takes it too far on stream! Shameful...
name: Meltdown

description:
Take a break from fighting to ask for donations.
\I[154]\C[10]-10
message1: %1 debases himself on camera for money!
name: Mendigar Dinero

description:
Run an ad break to make some extra cash.
\I[154]\C[10]-10
name: Run an Ad

description:
Shift the tone to a positive, calm one. Switch to
healing/support skills.
name: Calmarse

description:
End the stream.
Lose all viewers.
name: End Stream

message1: The Writer licks its wounds clean!
name: Writer Heal

message1: The Writer slams its heavy typewriter-head down!
name: Writer Attack

message1: The Writer sprays an inky mist!
name: Writer Blind

message1: The Writer emits a loud noise!
name: Writer Stun

message1: The Writer spits a thick glob of ink!
name: Writer Paralyze

message1: The Writer reaches out for someone to shove
name: Writer Kill

message1: The Writer sprays a colorful mist!
name: Writer Poison

message1: The Writer reads a confusing poem!
name: Writer Confuse

message1: The Writer recites a monotonous story!
name: Writer Sleep

message1: The Writer sings a declaration of love!
name: Writer Charm

description:
Hiss at a target, high probabilidad de cause panic.
Costs 5 STM to use.
name: Hiss!

description:
Shoot a swarm of roaches at a target!
Damage based on HP remaining.
name: Roach Cannon

description:
Shoot a massive swarm of roaches at all targets!
Damage based on HP remaining.
name: Roach Wave

description: Protect a target with a swarm of roaches!
name: Roach Shield

description:
Shoots enemy with a roach missile. Causa more daño
the more roach swarms the target has.
message1: %1 fires a roach at al enemigo!
name: Roach Missile

description:
Shoots enemy with a acid. Causa more daño
the more roach swarms the target has.
name: Roach's Acid Arrow

description:
Shoots a fireball at todos los enemigos. Causa more daño
the more roach swarms the targets have. Can Burn.
name: Roach Fireball

description:
Blasts 3 random enemies with ice. Causa more daño
the more roach swarms the target has. Can Freeze.
name: Roach Blizzard

description:
Zaps todos los enemigos with electricity. Causa more daño
the more roach swarms the target has. Can Paralyze.
name: Thunderoach

description: Sacrifice swarms of roaches to heal your party.
name: Healing Word: Roach

description:
Weapon attack boosted by your agility.
Slightly increased probabilidad de daño your weapon.
name: Jump Attack

description:
Boost your party's AGI and Evasion by 30% for
five turns. Also helps to stave off sleep status.
name: Nitro Boost

description:
Cura 25% life to one target in battle,
but has a 25% probabilidad de cause bleeding.
name: Médico de Combate

description:
Aaah! Causa shock daño to todos los enemigos. Bolstered
by users' level. May cause panic. How obnoxious!
name: Screamer

description:
Target becomes immune to most status effects
for 10 turns.
name: Numbness

description:
Boss an enemy around into fighting for you!
Can charm one target for up to 4 turns.
name: Croar Órdenes

description:
Taunts enemies into attacking you, and reduces
incoming daño by 25% for 5 turns.
name: Hurt Me Plenty

description: Ataque random targets 8 times in a row!
name: Octostrike

description: Rush Braver's forbidden technique...
name: Meteor Strike

description:
Cause a small but very painful wound. Pain reduces
accuracy and subtracts 1/10th of HP every turn.
name: Painful Stab

description: Aim carefully for that next attack...
name: Apuntar al Tiro Letal

description:
Ataque based on your accumulated booty!
Lose 5% of your treasure at every use.
message1: %1 wallops with a sock full of coins!
name: Calcetín con Dinero

description:
Driven mad by blood! Need to be \C[10]bleeding\C[0]to use.
Lose control, but become resilient and deadly.
message1: %1 goes out of their gatdam gourd!
name: Locura Sanguinaria

description:
Sip on a coffee and enter your flow state.
Lose control but regain 10% STM every turn.
name: Long Haul Flow

description:
Ram into the target. Receives a daño bonus
from your defense.
message1: %1 rushes al enemigo with an absurd tackle!
name: Running Tackle

description:
Move in, attack, move aside! The combat waltz of all
dungeon crawlers. Counterattacks for 4 turns.
message1: %1's begins to weave in and out of enemy range!
name: Danza de Mazmorra

description:
Stay put, but increases ballistics, ballistic
defense and shooting crit rate for 4 turns.
name: Garrison

description:
Boosts melee attack and ballistics, but also
increases all daño received for 3 turns!
name: Risk Taker

description: Use a powerful word. May confuse todos los enemigos.
name: Palabra Confusa

description:
Quick crushing attack based on agility.
Ignores half of defense, small probabilidad de aturdir.
name: Unlabeled Cartidge

description: Rush Braver's forbidden technique...
name: Meteor Strike

message1: %1 spends their last shred of humanity...
name: Last Shred Of Humanity

description:
Tackle attack using a shield.
Causa daño based on defense.
message1: %1 ataca bashes with the riot shield!
name: Golpe de Escudo

description:
Bite with an enormous crushing mouth!
Grows stronger by level.
name: Gran Mordisco

description:
Spew highly acidic development fluid. May cause
acid burns. Grows stronger by level.
name: Fluido Revelador

description: Emit a blinding flash! May blind todos los enemigos.
name: Destello Cegador

description:
Target is bound with film - unable to move and
more vulnerable to fire.
name: Film Bind

description:
Steal someone's soul with a photograph. May instantly
kill some enemies, and slowly drain the life of others.
message2: But he feels guilty about it...
name: Soul Taker

description:
Kick with many sharp legs! Hits four times on random
enemies, and may make them bleed.
name: Lyle Kicks

message1: %1 scarfs down a bunch of cheese!
name: Comer Queso

description:
Ataque that pierces half of target defenses.
Increased probabilidad de dañar el arma.
name: Pipe Thrust

description:
Blow a large cloud of bubbles that has a probabilidad de
put enemies to sleep.
message1: %1 blows forth a great cloud of bubbles!
name: Sleep Bubbles

description:
Blow an enormous bubble with a very large probabilidad de
put one enemy to sleep.
name: Giant Bubble

description: Inhale sharpy, preparing you for your next attack.
message1: %1 breathes deeply into his trumpet-like nose...
name: Inhalar

description: Stomp and crush todos los enemigos with your ungainly body.
message1: %1 stomps around on his many feet!
name: Trample

description: Perform a bizarre dance that confuses enemies.
name: Maddening Dance

description: Deal massive daño to an enemy that's asleep.
name: Devorador de Sueños

message1: %1 muerde into the spine and takes control!
name: Spinal Control

message1: %1 flails around with his many arms!
name: Flagelo

description: The kick of the mighty dragonfly.
name: Yanma Kick

description: Sprays enemies with venom and inflicts Poison state.
message1: %1 sprays a cloud of venemous spores.
name: Poison Spray

description: Sprays enemies with venom and inflicts Poison state.
message1: %1 sprays a cloud of venemous spores.
name: Poison Spore

description: (Corte)
name: Whip Attack

description:
Grapple one target with the whip. Grappled targets
have their attack and agility hindered.
message1: %1 constricts al enemigo with the whip!
name: Whip Constrict

description:
Drain life out of a target. Works best against
targets grappled by the whip.
message1: %1 absorbe al enemigo's fuerza vital through the whip.
name: Whip Drain

description: (Corte)
name: Worm Attack

description:
Drain life out of the target. Works best against
charmed targets.
message1: %1 absorbe al enemigo's fuerza vital through the whip.
name: Worm Drain

description: Spit a glob of poison-saturated saliva.
message1: %1 spews a repugnant wad of poisonous saliva!
name: Venom Spit

description:
Draw power from the poison coursing through your
veins.
message1: %1 lets the poison seep into their muscles...
name: Poison Strength

description:
Purge the venom from your system and regain
20% of your STM.
message1: %1 purges their body through force of will!
name: Venom Purge

description: Ataque your enemies in a blind rage!
message1: %1 can't see, but that doesn't stop 'em!
name: Rabia Ciega

description:
Take their eyes, and cram them into your own
sockets!
name: Eye Thief

description:
Squirt a stream of burning blood! Causa fire daño
based on your current HP. May cause burns.
message1: %1 spews their own flaming blood at al enemigo!
name: Chorro de Sangre

description:
Fling spikes of frozen blood to 3 random targets.
Causa cold daño based on remaining HP.
name: Frozen Blood

description:
Your own blood rains down. Causa acid daño to all
enemies based on your current HP.
message1: %1 rains acid blood from the heavens!
name: Lluvia de Sangre

description:
Heal your wounds and form a protective shell of
hardened blood. Cura bleed.
message1: %1 ends their bleeding through force of will!
name: Coagular

description:
Ashes from your own body chars one foe's flesh.
Causa daño based on your remaining SP.
message1: %1 sears their foes with their own flaming body.
name: Carbonizar Carne

description:
Ashes from your own body fly and burn your foes.
Causa daño based on your remaining SP.
message1: %1 sears their foes with their own flaming body!
name: Tormenta de Ceniza

description:
Your burned body draws moisture from an opponent.
Drains HP based on your remaining STM. Cura Burn.
message1: %1 sucks their moisture from their foe!
name: Desecar

description:
Melt your body down into goo. Near immunity to
physical daño, but weakened strength for 10 turns.
message1: %1 turns to a disgusting puddle of goo!
name: Melting Flesh

description:
Uses corrosive touch to drain life from a target.
Damage based on character level. Fuerteer if melted.
name: Consumir

description:
Violently explode, dealing high acid daño to
everyone nearby. Damage is based on current level.
message1: %1 explodes into a blob of corrosive acid.
name: Explotar

description:
Causa shadow daño to one enemy, with chance
to cause multiple status effects. Cura Pain on user.
message1: %1 mentally bombards al enemigo with horrific pain!
name: Migraine

description:
All allies lose half their HP, but resist daño and
mental effects for 10 turns. Cura Pain on user.
message1: %1 hollows the minds of their allies.
name: Hollowmind

description:
Causa shadow daño to todos los enemigos, with chance
to cause multiple status effects. Cura Pain on user.
name: Share Pain

description:
Vomit stomach acids. Acid daño on one enemy, based
on user's remaining HP. Painful to use.
name: Vomitar

description:
Spread the disease to one target.
Painful to use.
message1: %1 bursts a pustule on al enemigo!
name: Pus Discharge

description:
Grow covered in pus-filled boils. They protect
you from daño and infect enemies on touch.
message1: %1 grows disease boils all over their body!
name: Forúnculos

description:
Spread the disease to todos los enemigos.
Painful to use.
name: Estallido de Enfermedad

description:
Absorb life from all who are infected with the
disease.
message1: %1 absorbe the essence of the diseased!
name: Putrefaction

description:
Emit all radiation received as an explosion that hurts
both friend and foe. Damage is based on remaining HP.
name: Gamma Burst

description: Lose half of remaining HP to deal daño.
name: Grim Harvest

description: Lose half of remaining HP to heal ally.
name: Grafting

description: Lose half of remaining HP to regain STM.
name: Pruning

description:
Lose half of remaining HP to restore Hellen's
bloodlust early.
name: Salt the Earth

description:
Follow \n[1]'s lead for up to six turns, performing
extra actions.
name: Copiar a Papá

description: Piercing daño. Damage is based on current level.
name: Rat Bite

description:
Piercing daño. Damage is based on current level.
May devour smaller enemies.
name: Devorar

description:
A stalked target is more vulnerable to attacks
and critical hits.
name: Prowl

description: Very high daño on stalked target.
name: Abalanzarse

description: \N[8] goes absolutely deranged.
name: Predator Snarl

description:
\N[8] yells colorful abuse at the target.
Target becomes more vulnerable to daño for 3 turns.
name: Insult Barrage

description:
Can use bandages in combat.
Recovers 20% HP and heals bleed.
name: Vendaje Rápido

description:
Can use first aid kits in combat.
Recover 50% HP and revive.
name: Primeros Auxilios Rápidos

message1: Colonel Squeakums skitters into the fray!
name: Rat Bite

message1: Colonel Squeakums skitters into the fray!
name: Mordisco de Rata Quesera

description: Give the good Colonel some cheese!
name: Feed The Colonel

description:
Blast todos los enemigos with acoustic feedback.
Damage increases with character level.
name: Feedback

description:
Play a charming song to one target. May trick them
into fighting for you for a while.
name: Serenade

description:
Aumenta party's agility for 10 turns. Also 
rouses from sleep, and makes party immune to sleep.
name: Rousing Song

description:
Aumenta party's defenses for 10 turns. Also 
cures and prevents confusion.
name: Song of defense

description:
Aumenta party's attack for 10 turns. Also 
cures and prevents panic.
name: Song of strength

description:
Aumenta party's ailment resists for 10 turns. Also 
cures and prevents aturdir.
name: Song of willpower

description:
Party's normal attacks hit twice for 5 turns.
Also cures and prevents Freeze.
name: Doble Tiempo

message1: %1 spews a royal ichor on those who kneel.
name: Distinción Oscura

message1: Wires curl around %1's body and pierce the skin...
name: Puppeteer

description: Tickle bites at an enemy, draining some HP!
name: Tickle Bite

description: Tickle knows all the right words to cheer you up.
name: Tickle Cheer

description:
Tickle gives an emergency blood transfusion! Transfers
roughly half of your HP to target. 50% revive chance.
message1: Tickle performs an emergency blood transfusion!
name: Transfusion

description:
Tickle spits a jet of blood! Causa acid daño based
on remaining HP. Takes away some health.
message1: Tickle spews a jet of blood!
name: Jet de Sangre

description:
Ram into the target. Receives a daño bonus
from your remaining HP and defense.
name: Placaje

message1: Attacked by a tidal wave of biting rats!
name: Rat Swarm

description:
Ram into the target. Damage is based on your agility
and defense.
name: Machine Tackle

description:
Spit a burst of coins! Bullet daño to todos los enemigos,
based on remaining STM.
name: Keep the Change

description: Distribute Healing to todos los aliados.
name: Refreshments

description:
Spit a full cola can at a target. Acid daño to one
target, based on Balística.
name: Disparo de Lata

description:
Spits an ice-cold cola can. Cold daño to one
target, with a probabilidad de freeze. Based on Balística.
name: Freezing Shot

description:
Caution! Hot beverage! Fire daño to one target,
with a high probabilidad de burn. Based on Balística.
name: Espresso Shot

description:
Shook this can before launching. Blast daño to one
target, with a probabilidad de aturdir. Based on Balística.
name: Disparo Explosivo

description: Distribute stamina to todos los aliados.
name: Hot Drinks

description: Otorga a strength and ballistics boost to todos los aliados.
name: Fizzy Drinks

description:
Rush around at high speeds, tackling all foes.
Damage based on agility and current HP.
name: Conducción Temeraria

description:
Uses her enormous weight for a powerful body slam.
High crushing daño based on current HP.
name: Golpe de Cuerpo

description:
Boosts own defense and ballistics, but lowers agility
for 3 turns.
name: Ground Anchor

message1: %1 tosses a cupful of boiling hot cocoa!
name: Hot Cocoa Throw

description:
Send them flying high. High daño, aturdirs and burns.
Very high risk of damaging your weapon.
name: Globo Angelical

description:
Quick crushing attack based on agility.
Ignores half of defense, small probabilidad de aturdir.
name: Cabezazo

description: Inflige daño on an enemy.
name: Scorpion Hug

description:
Reveal your face. Stalks and confuses everyone.
Your defense falls, but melee attacks are more deadly.
name: Desenmascarar

description:
Ataques 4 targets. High daño on stalked targets.
Sates Hellen's bloodlust for a day.
name: Masacre

description: Attempts to blind todos los enemigos.
message1: Philippe flaps his wings, releasing a cloud of dust!
name: Nube de Polvo

description: Chance to inflict spore poison to todos los enemigos.
message1: Philippe releases a cloud of toxic spores!
name: Spore Cloud

description:
Otorga life regeneration to todos los aliados, but not
himself.
message1: %1 extends a mycelium network under the party!
name: Mycelium

description:
Charms an enemy infected with spores. May even
control enemies highly resistant to Charm.
name: Asumir Control

description:
Causa acid daño. May Afflict many status ailments
on spore-infected targets.
name: Putrefaction

description:
Consumes an unconscious ally, and gain great strength. 
Consumed allies can only return after a full night rest.
message1: %1 steals the strength of an ally!
name: Consumir Aliado

description:
Explodes into spores, dealing very high daño to
todos los enemigos.
name: Puffball Burst

description:
Melee attack empowered by the users' grasp
of language. Hits one target.
name: Scribal Strike

description:
Poderoso attack empowered by the users' grasp
of language. Hits 3 random enemies.
name: Poets' Dance

description:
Lash a long black tongue slices one target.
Bolstered by users' vocabulary. Causes bleed.
name: Sharp Tongue

description:
Speak your enemies to stop. May aturdir todos los enemigos.
Bolstered by users' vocabulary.
name: Words of Power

description:
Poderoso spell of fire contra todos los enemigos.
Bolstered by users' vocabulary.
name: Infernal Chant

description:
Poderoso spell that hits 3 targets at random.
Bolstered by users' vocabulary. May confuse targets.
name: Song of the Worms

description:
Poderoso spell against one target. Empowered by the
users' vocabulary.
name: Voz Primigenia

description: Cura wounds of one ally.
name: Primeros Auxilios

description:
A mighty sword attack contra todos los enemigos!
Power of the Heirloom Greatsword.
name: Rushing Wind

description: Recovers life, bolsters defense and attack.
name: Hero's Will

description: The fell power of the Demon Knuckles...
name: ¡Paliza!

description: Poderoso haymaker that may cause aturdir.
name: Gancho Demoníaco

description:
Lose control and fight till the end! Immune to status
effects while enraged.
name: Furia Demoníaca

description: Swing the enormous axe down on all foes!
name: Guillotine Chop

description: The legendary attack that fell the World Tree...
name: End Of Yggdrasil

description:
A warriors' second wind... Fully heals and restores
HP and STM. Can only be used once per battle.
name: Warrior's Rest

description: Cura todos los aliados's HP.
name: Healing Wind

description: Cleanses an ally of all status ailments.
name: Unción

description: Otorga protection and life regeneration to todos los aliados.
name: Prayer

description:
Mighty attack of the Sky Piercer Lance! Ignores
enemy defense.
name: Firmament Thrust

description:
Non-elemental daño attack to one foe.
Send a bolt of arcane energy to strike a foe.
name: Magic Missile

description: Protects an ally from magic daño for 5 turns.
name: Magic Shield

description:
Fire daño attack to one target.
May cause burns.
name: Llama

description:
Fire daño attack strikes enemies three times!
May cause burns.
name: Firestorm

description:
Ligeroning daño to one target.
May cause aturdir.
name: Descarga

description:
Very high lightning daño to one target.
Alta probabilidad to cause aturdir.
name: Relámpago

description:
Cold daño to one target.
May cause target to freeze.
name: Hielo

description:
High cold daño to all targets.
May cause targets to freeze.
name: Ventisca

description:
Vastly increases magic power for 3 turns. Drains
stamina over time.
name: Power Ritual

description: Breach the fabric of reality to destroy an opponent.
name: Fractura

description:
\N[34] \N[34]!
Bonk the bad guy on the noggin! That'll teach em!
name: Rabu Bonk

description:
\N[34] \N[34]!
Dance and wiggle around!
name: Rabu Dance

description:
\N[34] \N[34]!
Bake a cake for everyone to enjoy! Chocolate mousse!
name: Rabu Cake

description:
\N[34] \N[34]!
Use poison stinger!
name: Rabu Poison

description:
Power of the Ring of Torment. Curses the user to suffer
for 10000 years in The Vivisection Pit for each use.
name: Torment Beam

description: Strikes three times blindly at foes.
name: Estocadas Ciegas

description: Wide slash that hits todos los enemigos.
name: Horizontal Cut

description:
Unique attack of the Sword of Regicide. The blade
thirsts for royal blood.
name: Jaque Mate

description: Hide to strike in the shadows...
name: Esconderse

description: Strike from the shadows!
name: Asesinato

description: May aturdir and blind enemies!
name: Smoke Bomb

description: Injects a terrible poison into the foe.
name: Venom Stab

description: Poderoso attack that drains life.
name: Vampire Strike

description: Poderoso attack that drains STM.
name: Tajo Drenante

description:
Poderoso beam of pure darkness. Causa high shadow
daño to one target.
name: Rayo Oscuro

description:
Rain the fires of hell upon your enemies.
Hits enemies 4 times with fire.
name: Fuego Infernal

description:
Special attack of the Voidblade. Cuts 10% of targets'
remaining HP.
name: Void Slice

description: Slash with a hundred claws.
name: Ataque de Garra

description: Cura wounds of one ally.
name: Tears of Friendship

description: Whip and lash with slimy tentacles.
name: Tentacle Lash

description: Vomit a powerful acid.
name: Vómito Ácido

description: Bite with an enormous jaw.
name: Mordisco

description: Bite with venomous fangs.
name: Venomous Bite

description: Slash with a hundred claws.
name: Hundred Claws

description: Bite with a hundred snarling jaws.
name: Hundred Jaws

description: Kick with a heavy hoof.
name: Hoof Kick

description: Regrows lost limbs.
name: Regrow Limbs

description:
Ataque with your entire being. Hold nothing back.
Boosted by Atk, Def, Bal.Atk, Bal.Def, Agi and Suerte.
name: Situación Desesperada

description: Throw a cream pie at an opponent, blinding them!
name: Pie Throw

description:
Pie a friend or yourself in the face. Blinds and hurts
the target, but they recover some stamina!
name: Friend Pie

description:
Hit em on the noggin with a large rubber mallet.
Chance to aturdir!
name: Rubber Mallet

description:
Shoot a jet of acid from a flower pinned to your
shirt. Chance to cause acid burns!
message1: %1 squirts a jet of acid from a flower!
name: Flower Squirt

description: Shocking grasp with a probabilidad de paralyze the target.
name: Shocking Handshake

description: Pull out an enormous revolver from a tiny pocket.
message1: %1 pulls out an enormous revolver and dispara!
message2: A flag dispara out of the gun, it says BANG! on it.
name: Giant Revolver

description: Pull out an enormous revolver from a tiny pocket.
message1: %1 pulls out an enormous revolver and dispara!
name: Giant Revolver

description: Throw a cream pie at an opponent, blinding them!
name: Venom Stinger

description:
Very powerful attack against sleeping targets.
Increased chance of damaging weapon.
name: Amputar

description:
Ataque with a saw, causing high bleed.
Increased chance of damaging weapon.
name: Saw Off

description:
Shoot a very common steel marble.
Aumenta daño.
name: Steel Shot

description:
Shoot a common silver marble.
Doubles daño, pierces defenses.
name: Silver Shot

description:
Shoot a common bouncing marble.
Hits enemies 3 times.
name: Disparo Rebotante

description:
Shoot a common bumblebee marble.
Increased daño, hits todos los enemigos.
name: Disparo Abejorro

description:
Shoot an uncommon red wave marble.
Increased daño, causes bleeding.
name: Disparo Sangrante

description:
Shoot an uncommon jade ribbon marble.
Causa acid daño.
name: Disparo Ácido

description:
Shoot an uncommon sunburst marble.
Causa fire daño, may cause burns.
name: Disparo Ardiente

description:
Shoot an uncommon black onyx marble.
Causa triple daño.
name: Super Shot

description:
Shoot an uncommon striped marble.
Causa crushing daño and may aturdir.
name: Stunning Shot

description:
Shoot a rare Super Bouncer marble.
Hits enemies 6 times.
name: Super Bouncer Shot

description:
Shoot a rare Yellow Slag marble.
Causa shocking daño and may paralyze.
name: Shocking Shot

description:
Shoot a rare Star marble.
Causa blast daño to todos los enemigos, and may aturdir.
name: Disparo Explosivo

description:
Shoot a rare Ice marble.
Causa cold daño, and may freeze.
name: Freezing Shot

description:
Shoot a rare Crimson Swirl marble.
Steals life from target.
name: Vampiric Shot

description:
Shoot an ultra rare Golden marble.
Damage increased eightfold.
name: Ultra Shot

description:
Shoot an ultra rare Skull marble.
Damage increased, and chance for instant death.
name: Disparo Mortal

description:
Shoot an ultra rare Cupid's marble.
Damage increased, and may charm enemies.
name: Disparo Encantador

description:
Shoot an ultra rare Void marble.
Shadow daño. Halves target's life.
name: Void Shot

description:
Shoot an ultra rare Rainbow marble.
Increased daño. Causa multiple status effects.
name: Rainbow Shot

message2: A dense swarm of insects attack!
name: Mummy's Curse

message1: %1 speaks a curse of broken bones!
name: Maldición Ósea

description:
Hey watch it! You'll break my glasses!
Reduces chance enemies target you.
message1: %1 tries to appear as non-threatening as possible.
message2: "You wouldn't hit me on my birthday?!!"
name: Wuss Out

description:
Get everyone together. Group boost to Hit rate, 
Critical chance, and Panic resist. May cure panic.
name: Strategic Huddle

description:
You could talk about geology for hours.
May make enemies drowsy, or put them to sleep.
name: Conferencia Aburrida

description:
Boosts party's resistance to fire and make them
immune to burns. Safety first!
name: Fire safety protocol

description:
Convince someone they weren't REALLY afflicted by
Confusion, Rage, Poison, Charm, Paralysis or Blind.
name: Um, actually...

description:
Convince them they're on the wrong side of history.
May charm an opponent to fight on your side.
name: Discutir

description:
Alright everybody chill! We can figure this out.
Talk this through. Chance to aturdir todos los enemigos.
name: Time-Out!

description:
Steal someone's soul with a photograph. May instantly
kill some enemies, and slowly drain the life of others.
message2: But he feels guilty about it...
name: Soul Steal

description: Order your allies to attack!
name: Royal Decree

description:
Appoint a Battle Governor to receive many boons
during the fight.
name: Designar Gobernador
